resources.string: The Rijksmuseum is a national museum of the Netherlands dedicated to Dutch arts and history. Discover they art collection in this app.
The Movie Database is a popular, user editable database for movies and TV shows. Discover the most popular movies using this app.
Tracks how much progress you accomplish in these key areas of your life. Every day you can see how you are finishing the goals set for you.
This app helps you to plan your next holidays. You can track the places, itinerary, hotels and more using this application,
